Featuring 245 hotel rooms, two chef-driven restaurants that will transport your taste buds around the globe, community-led inspired events, creative meeting & event spaces including the urban living room, and a rooftop pool serving the latest libations. With health and well-being top of mind, we have developed REST ASSURED, a 5-point program designed to ensure guests and staff may be put at ease while on property. Program standards, including advanced cleaning protocols, physical distancing, and transparent communication, are based on guidance from the Centers for Disease Control (CDC), World Health Organization (WHO), and American Hotel and Lodging Association (AHLA). No detail has been left unturned and we thank you for staying with us. AAA 4 Diamond RatediHotelier/iStay

name: Biltmore Hotel
description: Boasting amenities including an 18-hole golf course and a full-service spa, this historic resort in Coral Gables, Florida is just 4 miles from Miami International Airport. Brickell City Center is 6.2 mi away. University of Miami is 1.6 miles away Robes and linens are offered in each room at the Biltmore Hotel. A 65-inch flat-screen TV and telephone are also included. The Biltmore Hotel offers 10 lighted tennis courts, an outdoor 2300 square yard swimming pool with cabanas, and an on-site fitness center. In addition, the hotel offers over 150 acres of lush tropical landscape and spacious meeting and banquet facilities. Guests staying at the Biltmore can enjoy a variety of gourmet dining options, including contemporary French cuisine at Palme d'Or and classic Italian dishes at Fontana. The hotel also offers classic pub fare at the 19th Hole restaurant and a Sunday Champagne Brunch. Shopping and dining at Village of Merrick Park are just 1.8 miles from this hotel. Guests will be 5.1 miles from Vizcaya Museum and Gardens, and 3.3 miles from coconut Grove.

name: Edition Miami Beach
description: With luxury hotel accommodations and an oceanfront setting, The Miami Beach EDITION is an ideal escape. Local venues and iconic attractions, including Miami Beach Convention Center, the Fillmore and Perez Art Museum Miami, are minutes away. Return from the beach and experience exceptional dining at our restaurants developed by Michelin-starred Chef Jean-Georges Vongerichten. This Miami Beach hotel boasts two ocean-facing pools, a wellness spa with a gym, a nightclub, a bowling alley and an ice-skating rink, as well as chic indoor and outdoor event space. Decorated in sophisticated style, every hotel room features large windows and views of the city, pool or ocean. Unwind from the Miami Beach scene in your pet-friendly room that showcases plush bedding, a marble bathroom, a desk and free Wi-Fi. Revel in the living and dining areas of our oceanfront suites, ideal for entertaining family and friends. Our luxury bungalows promote a sense of privacy and well-being with their plunge pools and serene terraces.Marriott

name: The Hoxton Downtown La
description: Located in Los Angeles, a 10-minute walk from Microsoft Theater, The Hoxton, Downtown LA provides accommodations with free bikes, private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a shared lounge. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The property is 0.6 miles from the city center and a 11-minute walk from Staples Center. Guest rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The Hoxton, Downtown LA has certain rooms with city views, and each room is equipped with an electric tea pot. All rooms will provide guests with a fridge. At the accommodation you'll find a restaurant serving French, Peruvian and Spanish cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and kosher options can also be requested. The Hoxton, Downtown LA has a terrace. Guests at the hotel will be able to enjoy activities in and around Los Angeles, like cycling. LA Union Station is 2.1 miles from The Hoxton, Downtown LA, while California Science Center is 2.8 miles away. The nearest airport is Hawthorne Municipal Airport, 11 miles from the accommodation.

name: Hilton Miami Dadeland
description: The new Hilton Miami Dadeland is just 13 miles from Miami International Airport and 2 miles from the famous Dadeland Center, Mall and Metro Station. The hotel is conveniently located near Baptist Hospital of Miami as well as South Miami's most popular shopping, dining, and attractions. Downtown Miami, beautiful beaches and neighboring hotspots of Coral Gables, Coconut Grove, Homestead, Key Biscayne and The Keys are all just minutes away. Settle in for a relaxing stay in one of our new upscale guest rooms and suites. Enjoy thoughtful features such as WiFi, LCD TVs, a work desk with ergonomic chair and a coffeemaker. Our suites also include a seating area, some with sofa beds and kitchenettes - ideal for families or extended stays. The hotel also offers Hilton's revolutionary, state-of-the-art Five Feet to Fitness in-room wellness concept, bringing 11 different fitness equipment and accessory options into the guest room. Five Feet to Fitness is perfect for exercise enthusiasts who prefer to work out in private. Furthering the focus on overall wellness for leisure and business travelers, Hilton Miami Dadeland features a health and wellness center with yoga and Pilates classes, a meditation garden, a heated outdoor pool and walking and jogging trails at the property. Hilton Miami Dadeland offers a large meeting and event space in the area, with 10,000 square feet of indoor and outdoor meeting space, including a 6,250-square-foot ballroom with private outdoor patio and dedicated pre-function areas. In addition to the hotel's new farm-to-table restaurant, Hilton Miami Dadeland offers a grab-n-go pantry, Starbucks, a Wall of Water bar with bottled water from around the world and room service.Hilton

name: Berkeley Park MGallery Hotel Collection
description: The Berkeley Park MGallery Collection Hotel is a 4-star boutique beauty under the prestigious MGallery brand. Representative of Miami's high-end luxury and cultural appeal, the Berkeley Park is nestled in an art-centric hub of Miami Beach. This historic gem is just a block from the Convention Center and Bass Art Museum and features large rooms, Mediterranean Revival architecture, a gorgeous inner patio, and the award-winning Cleo Restaurant. Welcome to your sanctuary in South Beach.accorhotels.com

name: Hilton Woodland Hills/Los Angeles
description: Enjoy the Southern-California climate of the West San Fernando Valley. With friendly hospitality and affordable accommodations. Hilton Woodland Hills/Los Angeles hotel offers top-tier service guests expect. Our Warner Center location offers access to all that Metropolitan Los Angeles has to offer. Shopping, restaurants, and businesses are all within walking distance. Hotel Features: 330 spacious guest rooms and suites. USB ports, In room safe, refrigerator, WiFi, 55 inch HDTV, coffee maker, and premium entertainment options. Stay fit with complimentary Fitness Center with treadmills with Satellite TV, bikes, and ellipticals. Our complimentary Business Center in the lobby is available 24-hours. Our sensational Runway Restaurant offers a casual atmosphere and the fresh flavors of its California cuisine, or enjoy our Lounge for a beverage or snack in a comfortable setting. Market Express, available 24 hours, has classic snacks and yummy sandwiches. We are within walking distance of many dining choices such as Morton's Steakhouse and premier shopping including Neiman Marcus and Nordstrom. The hotel has 17,000 square feet of divisible meeting space with an experienced catering staff to service your next meeting, banquet and social event. Please note that the capacity of the room may not reflect the catering service capacity. Reach out to us with any questions. You will find our hotel near major Los Angeles attractions including Universal Studios, The Getty Center, Malibu Beach and Hollywood. The hotel is just off the Ventura (101) Freeway within Warner Center in Woodland Hills, 25 miles northwest of downtown Los Angeles, California. We are also close to neighboring communities like West Lake Village, Van Nuys, Sherman Oaks, Thousand Oaks and Chatsworth. Welcome to the Hilton Woodland Hills/Los Angeles hotel, we look forward to serving you!Hilton

name: Mandarin Oriental, Miami
description: With stunning views of the Miami skyline and Biscayne Bay, this hotel on Brickell Key Island offers luxurious spa services. The Shops at Mary Brickell Village are located just 3117 feet away from the Mandarin Oriental, Miami. A balcony, flat-screen cable TV with a DVD player, and iPod docking station are included in all guest rooms. Guests can enjoy a well-stocked mini-bar, evening turndown service, and marble bathroom with walk-in shower and separate bathtub. Mandarin Oriental, Miami offers an infinity-edge outdoor pool with butler service as well as a state-of-the-art fitness center. After a yoga class or personal training session, guests can relax with a massage in the full-service spa. La Mar by Gaston Acurio prepares Peruvian dishes while MO Bar + Lounge paires classic cocktails with a light fare menu. Miami city center is only 3 minutes' drive away from the Mandarin Oriental hotel, and South Beach district is located 6.3 mi away. The Wynwood Arts District is 3.4 mi away, and Coconut Grove is 13 minutes' drive from the property.

name: Kimpton Hotel Palomar South Beach
description: Sunset Harbour is Miami’s most vibrant and most walkable neighborhood thanks to the introduction of specialty restaurants, boutiques, coffee shops, and an array of amenities that cover every need. It has inspired breakthrough companies to establish shops and turn the neighborhood into a must-visit destination for locals and tourists alike. The Kimpton Palomar is perfectly situated, at the most desirable junction of Lincoln Road, to be the refined gateway to this neighborhood and just steps away from Bay Biscayne with a distinctly residential feel and a quiet confidence of those who arrived.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: The Balfour Hotel
description: Located in South Beach, Hotel Room Mate Lord Balfour is a perfect starting point from which to explore Miami Beach (FL). Both business travelers and tourists can enjoy the hotel's facilities and services. To be found at the hotel are free Wi-Fi in all rooms, taxi service, ticket service, 24-hour front desk, facilities for disabled guests. Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find television LCD/plasma screen, internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, air conditioning, heating. Enjoy the hotel's recreational facilities, including fitness center, before retiring to your room for a well-deserved rest. Hotel Room Mate Lord Balfour combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Miami Beach (FL) unforgettable.Agoda

name: Hyatt Regency Boston/Cambridge
description: Located 2 miles from Harvard Square, this Cambridge, MA hotel features on-site dining. Boston city center is 3 miles away. A flat-screen cable TV, iPod dock, coffee maker, and free toiletries are included in the rooms at the Hyatt Regency Boston/Cambridge, Overlooking Boston. The rooms also include a sofa and desk. This Hyatt Regency features concierge service and 24-hour front desk assistance. The hotel also has on-site fitness and and offers dining options from Paperback Tavern & Provisions to Paperback Provisions. Massachusetts Institute of Technology is less than a mile from the hotel. Fenway Park, home of the Boston Red Sox baseball team, is 1.8 miles away.

name: Canopy by Hilton Boston Downtown
description: Surrounded by markets, restaurants, and parks, our hotel is tucked between downtown and Boston's historic North End. Our Canopy Bikes are perfect for sightseeing, with several trails and famous historic sites within half a mile. We're also within walking distance of TD Garden, Government Center, Faneuil Hall, and the Freedom Trail.Hilton

name: Hotel Indigo Boston Garden, An IHG Hotel
description: Nestled near North Station and TD Garden, and three miles from Logan Airport, Hotel Indigo Boston Garden offers comfort and convenience. Our renovated, pet-friendly, boutique hotel is steeped in history. Experience spacious rooms and a restaurant that blends hearty pub fare with New England charm. Enjoy our 24-hour fitness center, boardroom, and free Wi-Fi. The ideal hotel for attending Boston concerts, we’re also close to the financial center, JFK Building and GSA, healthcare facilities like Massachusetts General Hospital and Massachusetts Eye Ear, and universities like Harvard, Boston University, MIT, and Boston College. Follow the Freedom Trail and explore Faneuil Hall, Paul Revere's house, and Boston Harbor. Begin your Boston adventure.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: The London West Hollywood At Beverly Hills
address: 1020 North San Vicente Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA 90069
description: Steps from Beverly Hills and Rodeo Drive shopping, this boutique West Hollywood hotel features a rooftop with cabanas and a restaurant that serves a daily complimentary à la carte breakfast menu. Guests can also enjoy the fitness center and multiple dining options on-site. Featuring free WiFi, each air-conditioned suite at The London West Hollywood includes a flat-screen TV and an iPod docking station. Standard suites include an open floor plan with plenty of living space and the hotel also offers 1 to 3-bedroom specialty suites. All suites provide mirrored closets and a vanity, a walk-in shower with 2 shower heads and a soak tub. Most suites also include a balcony with views. Many larger suites also boast completely separate seating areas with wet bars and walk-in closets. The property's complimentary breakfast includes pastries, bagels & lox, cheeses, charcuterie, yogurt parfaits, fresh juices, coffee & tea, cereals, and other seasonal varieties. Guests of The London can choose unique dining options. Boxwood at the London West Hollywood features California cuisine with a menu that includes seasonal, fresh local produce and small plates. The restaurant includes an elegant cocktail bar and an extensive wine list. The Rooftop features outdoor dining and a seasonal menu and serves lunch, dinner and brunch. The London West Hollywood also provides guests with a fitness center. The 24-hour facilities include cardio equipment, Life Fitness machines and an outdoor yoga area. Guests can also visit the on-site salon for hair styling, nail, & makeup services. Cabanas can be rented at the pool area and are equipped with mini-bars. Guests can order from the property bar as well. Beverly Hills and the Beverly Center Mall are 4 minutes’ drive away. The Hollywood Walk of Fame and Melrose Avenue shopping are just 10 minutes’ drive away. West Hollywood is a great choice for travelers interested in nightlife, restaurants, design and clothes shopping.

name: Arlo Wynwood
description: Located under a 20-minute walk from School Board Metromover Station, Arlo Wynwood provides guests with an ideal base when in Miami. It also offers an express check-in and check-out feature, a swimming pool and free Wi-Fi. Guests can make the most of the sun on the terrace or enjoy a beverage at the bar. Welcoming and professional team members are available 24 hours a day. Arlo Wynwood has 214 air conditioned rooms. A refrigerator, blackout curtains and a flat-screen TV are also provided. The hotel provides parking and is a short car ride from American Airlines Arena. Port of Miami and Bayfront Park are a short drive away.Revato

name: Mayfair House Hotel & Garden
description: Located 2.5 mi from historical Vizcaya Museum and Gardens, this luxury Coconut Grove boutique hotel features a rooftop pool, bar and lounge, and on-site gourmet dining. Spacious accommodations offering a 65-inch flat-screen TVs, a bar, en-suite coffee and tea making machines. Some rooms feature private outdoor showers. A State of the Art 24-hour fitness center featuring cardio, and free weights. Guests will be 11 mi from iconic South Beach and 14 minutes' drive from the University of Miami. Miami International Airport is 20 minutes' drive from the accommodations.

name: 1 Hotel West Hollywood
description: Set in Los Angeles, 984 feet from Sunset Strip, 1 Hotel West Hollywood offers rooms with air conditioning and free WiFi. The property is around 2.4 mi from Dolby Theater, 2.4 mi from Hollywood Walk of Fame and 3.1 mi from Petersen Automotive Museum. The property is located 3.1 mi from Melrose Avenue and 3.1 mi from Capitol Records Building. Every room is designed with floor-to-ceiling windows, native greenery, rustic wood, earthen plaster, clay tones, marble bathrooms, and organic cotton linens. The property has communal spaces for working or relaxing, 24-hour Fieldhouse fitness center, an outdoor pool with views of the LA skyline, two restaurants and two bars.Guests will have access to a Tesla vehicle for complimentary drop-off service within a 2 mi radius, subject to availability, from 7:00 to 23:00 hours every day. The accommodations can conveniently provide information at the reception to help guests to get around the area. Los Angeles County Museum Of Art / LACMA is 3.7 mi from 1 Hotel West Hollywood, while Hollywood Bowl is 3.7 mi away. The nearest airport is Hollywood Burbank Airport, 11 mi from the property.

name: Montrose at Beverly Hills
description: Montrose at Beverly Hills is located in a quiet West Hollywood neighborhood, just 0.5 mi from the famous Sunset Strip. The hotel offers a rooftop pool terrace with a pool, a tennis court, and cabanas. An on-site restaurant is also available. All rooms and suites at The Montrose feature an HDTV, a fireplace, a hairdryer, a refrigerator, and a fully stocked mini-bar. Most suites include a balcony and some offer a kitchenette. Accessible rooms are available upon request. Rooftop poolside dining is also available for those looking to eat a lighter meal outside. Other rooftop amenities include a full seasonal bar that overlooks Hollywood and a regulation-sized tennis court. Guests can also enjoy a welcome beverage, two complimentary bottles of welcome water, morning coffee & tea, and a fitness center. Notable venues such as Whiskey A Go Go, The Roxy Theater, & Soho House are within 10 minutes’ walk from the property. Rodeo Drive & Beverly Hills are 5 minutes’ drive away.

name: Hotel Ziggy Los Angeles
address: 8462 West Sunset Boulevard, West Hollywood, CA 90069
description: Located on the famous Sunset Strip, this boutique hotel offers the largest saltwater pool in West Hollywood and a 24-hour fitness center. All guest rooms feature WiFi. A flat-screen TV is included in each room. Bathrooms are equipped with a rain shower head and a hairdryer. Guests can utilize complimentary toiletries and an iron with ironing facilities. Our hotel offers a unique access to the West Hollywood fun. Soak up Hollywood Glam at it's best, this fashionable fixture on storied Sunset Boulevard exudes edgy, urban sophistication. Learn what makes us a place for a new generation of travelers seeking boutique touches and authentic experiences in the heart of West Hollywood. You will find a 24-hour front desk at this Hollywood hotel. Guests can enjoy shopping, restaurants and nightlife on Sunset Boulevard at iconic hot spots such as Katana, The Roxy, The Whiskey and the Viper Room. The Hollywood Walk of Fame is 3 miles from our property. Universal Studios Hollywood is 15 minutes' drive from the hotel.

name: Viceroy Santa Monica
description: Just 16 mi from Los Angeles, Viceroy Santa Monica is ideally located, just steps to the ocean and a short walk to the pier. With many rooms offering panoramic views of the Pacific Ocean, and the balance, of our two-outdoor pools and cabanas. Whether you're looking to relax poolside, lounge in our Pool Cabanas, or enjoy the privacy of our Backyard Cabanas, Viceroy Santa Monica offers the perfect outdoor retreat for families or friends. If venturing is more your style, our bicycle rentals are available for all our registered guests. Santa Monica Place and 3rd Street Promenade are nearby. The Viceroy is 8.7 mi from The Getty Museum. The Hotel is 9 mi from the Los Angeles International Airport.

name: JW Marriott Los Angeles L.A. LIVE
address: 900 West Olympic Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA 90015
description: Experience a new level of luxury at JW Marriott Los Angeles L.A. LIVE. Offering an unbeatable location in the heart of downtown Los Angeles, only steps away from the excitement of L.A. LIVE, the Convention Center, Peacock Theatre and Crypto.com Arena, our hotel is ideally suited for both business and leisure travelers. Our hotel rooms and suites feature luxury bedding, a flat-screen TV, an ergonomic workspace and a marble bathroom, and many rooms offer magnificent downtown views. Savor fresh local fare at our on-site restaurants, pamper yourself at our spa or relax by our sparkling outdoor pool. Those seeking a remarkable destination for a business or social event in downtown Los Angeles can take advantage of 135,000 square feet of versatile, contemporary venue space, as well as knowledgeable planning and catering teams. Along with placing you moments from L.A. LIVE, our hotel is convenient to the University of Southern California and Dodger Stadium. Luxury abounds at JW Marriott Los Angeles L.A. LIVE.Marriott

name: The Whitney Hotel Boston
description: The Whitney Hotel, a new 65-room luxury hotel, will offer guests generous hospitality through sophisticated simplicity and cultured comforts. Named after Henry Melville Whitney, a prominent Boston industrialist and one-time owner of the hotel site, the property is a haven apart from the urban hustle, welcoming guests with uncomplicated, urbane luxury, complemented by the comforts and indulgences of home. With health and well-being top of mind, we have developed REST ASSURED, a 5-point program designed to ensure guests and staff may be put at ease while on property. Program standards, including advanced cleaning protocols, physical distancing, and transparent communication, are based on guidance from the Centers for Disease Control (CDC), World Health Organization (WHO), and American Hotel and Lodging Association (AHLA). No detail has been left unturned and we thank you for staying with us.iHotelier/iStay

name: AC Hotel By Marriott Miami Dadeland
description: AC Hotel Miami Dadeland offers modern accommodations with timeless European design. Perfectly located next to Dadeland Mall and walking distance to Dadeland South Metro Station. Downtown Dadeland is just a few minutes away and nearby attractions such as Fairchild Tropical Botanic Garden, Everglades, and University of Miami. Public spaces feature unique artwork, while guestrooms provide a modern oasis with wood look flooring, complimentary WiFi and 55" HDTV. Take a dip in the outdoor pool and grab a cocktail in the pool deck cocktail lounge featuring our signature AC gin and tonic. The AC Lounge is the place to unwind with carefully crafted cocktails and tapas style bites. If you are looking to hold a event or meeting, our 3,610 sq. ft. of venue space for up to 255 people offers flexible venues and an experienced event staff. Our unbeatable location lets you walk to Dadeland Mall for an lively day of shopping, dining and entertainment. We look forward to providing you excellent service!Marriott

name: Doubletree Suites By Hilton Hotel Boston - Cambridge
description: The DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Boston – Cambridge offers an ideal location along the scenic banks of the Charles River. Discover a warm welcome and comfortable accommodation at our all-suite Boston hotel. Relax and spread out during your stay in one of our two-room suites at the DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Boston - Cambridge. Each two-room suite provides homelike comforts including a fridge, microwave, coffee maker, room service and LCD flat-screen HDTV. Discover some of the best entertainment in Boston at the legendary Scullers Jazz Club. This award-winning Jazz Club offers world-class entertainment and spectacular views of the Boston skyline. Treat yourself to dinner and a show, or enjoy the casual environment and inspired flavors of The Green Room, open for breakfast and dinner. Host a meeting or event in the 9,500 sq. ft. of versatile meeting and ballroom space. Hold an elegant cocktail reception on the area’s only rooftop terrace, with dazzling views of Boston, or let our event services team put together your special occasion in our ballroom overlooking the Charles River. Enjoy customized menus and a 24-hour business center providing complimentary internet access. Unwind with a cocktail and watch your favorite sports team on our two large LCD TVs, or enjoy light food and complimentary internet access at Fusion, our modern all-day lounge. Our friendly staff looks forward to welcoming you to this Boston hotel with the legendary warm DoubleTree chocolate chip cookie.Hilton

name: Le Méridien Boston Cambridge
description: Anchoring the renowned University Park at MIT, Le Méridien Cambridge-MIT stands amidst an area legendary for its infrastructure of invention. The Boston/Cambridge area is a cultural capital of the US including world-renowned music ensembles like The Boston Symphony Orchestra, the Handel and Haydn Society, in addition to hundreds of museums, such as the Museum of Fine Arts, the Museum of Science and the Children's Museum. Le Méridien Cambridge-MIT's elegant guest rooms and suites offer a place of luxurious sanctuary and unmatched comfort.Marriott

name: Boston Yacht Haven
description: This waterfront inn features an on-site marina that is filled with boats during the summer season. All rooms feature free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV, and views of the harbor or city. Faneuil Hall/Quincy Market is 10 minutes’ walk away. Each room at Boston Yacht Haven has nautical theme decor, a microwave, and a refrigerator. Select rooms include a sea view, private balcony, or sofa bed. A fitness center is available for guests to use at the Commercial Wharf Boston Yacht Haven. Laundry facilities are available as well. A free continental breakfast is served each morning. Various waterfront dining options, including the Chart House Restaurant and Joe's American Bar & Grill are within 5 minutes’ walk from the inn. The New England Aquarium is half a mile from the Yacht Haven. Boston Common is 1 mile away.

name: The Langham, Boston
description: This historic, newly renovated 5-star hotel in downtown Boston was originally the Federal Reserve Bank. It overlooks Norman B. Leventhal Park and features gourmet dining, guestrooms and event spaces, a heated indoor swimming pool and a 24-hour fitness center. A 50-inch LED HD-TV with streaming capabilities and mini-bar are in every Hotel Langham room. The Faneuil Hall Marketplace, New England Aquarium and the Freedom Trail Foundation are all one-half mile from The Langham, Boston. The Boston Convention Center is 1 mile away. Italian family-style meals are prepared in Grana, the new classic restaurant located in the former Federal Reserve Bank’s grand hall. The Fed, a cocktail bar will serve craft cocktails, beers and elevated pub dishes. Each room is designed with blue colors with custom furniture and features an Italian marble bathroom with plush bathrobes and slippers.

name: Hotel June West L.A., a Member of Design Hotels
description: The little sibling of the Proper Hotels, Hotel June is a beacon of creativity in L.A.’s Westside neighborhood. Set inside a mid-century modern building, the hotel has a breezy California sensibility brought to life by the visionary designers at Studio Collective. Warm woods and light blues recall the beach—just down the street—while quirky design elements and colorful Terrazzo add a playful punch. Rooms are serene and light-filled, with Aesop amenities, luxurious linens, and views of the beach and the Santa Monica mountains from some rooms. The buzzed-about rooftop restaurant draws guests and locals for poolside snacks, cocktails, and more elaborate dining affairs.Marriott

name: Hotel Aka Boston Common
description: Conveniently located in the center of the city, this 4-star hotel makes for an excellent base in Boston. It is close to Boston Freedom Trail, restaurants and shops. There are a variety of facilities at Hotel AKA Boston Common that guests can enjoy, such as free Wi-Fi, an express check-in and check-out feature and a gym. Staff are available 24/7 and can book tours and tickets. Rooms at Hotel AKA Boston Common provide a stylish space to relax, complete with an iPod docking station and a flat-screen TV. Each includes its very own bathroom with bathrobes and a hair dryer. In-house dining options include a restaurant, which is an ideal spot to enjoy a meal. The hotel is ideally located for exploring Boston with Faneuil Hall and Boston Commons within a 10-minute walk. It is also within walking distance of New England Aquarium and TD Garden.HotelsCombined

name: Andaz West Hollywood-a concept by Hyatt
address: 8401 West Sunset Boulevard, West Hollywood, CA 90069
description: Just 5 minutes’ walk from the Sunset Strip, the Andaz West Hollywood - a Concept by Hyatt features onsite dining and a rooftop pool. Rooms feature complimentary nonalcoholic beverages and snacks and free WiFi. A flat-screen TV and an electronics docking station are provided in each room at the Andaz West Hollywood - a Concept by Hyatt. Free toiletries and bathrobes are also provided in the modern rooms. RH, the West Hollywood Andaz’s onsite restaurant. features seasonal California cuisine. The restaurant works to highlight “market to table” dishes. RH Bar is a chic evening space serving signature cocktails and appetizers. Guests can enjoy The Sundeck for poolside dining with fresh, light options. A business center and fitness center are available for guest use. The Beverly Plaza is 2 mi away from the hotel. Hollywood is 3.1 mi from the property.

name: The Ambrose
description: Located at the corner of 20th and Arizona Street, The Ambrose is in a quiet and unassuming neighborhood in the heart of vibrant Santa Monica. Having recently completed an extensive, multi-million dollar renovation of all 77 guestrooms and public spaces, the distinctive California Craftsman design has been revitalized to reflect the essence of a large private home. Luxury linens, C.O. Bigelow bath products, complimentary in-room HSIA WiFi, included continental breakfast, complimentary fitness center access and complimentary house car service await all guests! With health and well-being top of mind, we have developed REST ASSURED, a 5-point program designed to ensure guests and staff may be put at ease while on property. Program standards, including advanced cleaning protocols, physical distancing, and transparent communication, are based on guidance from the Centers for Disease Control (CDC), World Health Organization (WHO), and American Hotel and Lodging Association (AHLA). No detail has been left unturned and we thank you for staying with us.iHotelier/iStay

name: The Beverly Hilton
description: The Beverly Hilton, a Forbes four star hotel, combines the excitement of Old Hollywood with the unparalleled elegance of Beverly Hills. Nestled in the heart of the entertainment capital of the world, we offer our guests the opportunity to become fully immersed in the grandeur of this world-class city. From shopping to dining to entertainment opportunities in the Greater Los Angeles area, we offer our guests easy access to all that they could possibly ask for and more, including: Rodeo Drive - World-famous shops and boutiques, renowned for their exceptional high-end offerings and celebrity clientele. Santa Monica Pier - Extending out over the ocean in beautiful Santa Monica, the Pier offers rides, games, and entertainment fun for the whole family. 3rd Street Promenade - Outdoor shopping and dining exclusively for walkers and located a mere three blocks from Santa Monica’s beaches. Staples Center - The home of the Los Angeles Kings (NHL), the Los Angeles Clippers (NBA), and the Los Angeles Lakers. Grauman's Chinese Theater. The Grove - Outdoor shopping, dining, and entertainment venue: also the home of the Original Los Angeles Farmers' Market. Dodger Stadium, The Los Angeles Memorial Coliseum, The Rose Bowl. J. Paul Getty Center - An architecturally stunning museum that rests high above Sunset Boulevard and houses collections by some of the world’s greatest artists. Griffith Park Observatory, Hollywood Sign, Universal Studios.The hotel features 569 luxuriously-appointed guest rooms and suites, each of which offers a unique perspective on this great city. All of our accommodations offer the finest in creature comforts, including: Plasma screen televisions, Bose Wave music systems, Lodgenet high-definition programming, L'Occitane bath amenities, European linens, Access to high-speed Internet and Wi-Fi.At the hotel, we appreciate that no two guests are alike. For that reason, we offer a wide variety of packages suited for all sorts of travelers: Bed and Breakfast, Beverly Hills Romance Package, American Girl Place, Aqua Star Pool Family Fun Package, Rest, Relax, & Rejuvenate Spa Package.We invite our guests to enjoy everything that our hotel has to offer, from dining opportunities to entertainment, and everything in between. We welcome everyone to enjoy casual dining suited for the entire family at CIRCA 55, and also to revel in the atmosphere of Trader Vic's Lounge - the acclaimed Polynesian restaurant and bar - famous for originating the world-famous Mai Tai. At The Beverly Hilton, there is something for everyone. Other hotel features include: The Lobby Lounge, Bar 210/ Plush - Beverly Hills' only lounge and ultra-lounge, Bar 210 offers an experience unlike any other in the Greater Los Angeles area. Aqua Star Spa, The Beverly Hilton Pool - An outdoor oasis, this is the largest heated pool in all of Beverly Hills. Fitness Center by Precor, Denis Bloch Fine Art. Le Chateau - A fine wine retailer specializing in California wines, guests may also schedule wine tasting events. Hours Minutes Seconds - A premier retailer of top-of-the-line timepieces. The Bellezza Salon, Accents Gift Shop, AVT Event Technologies and Business Center, 24-hour automated business center, Midway Car Rental. This hotel offers over 60,000 square feet of meeting space in 22 venues, each with its own distinct personality and atmosphere. Our Events and Catering teams are on-hand to ensure that every event surpasses our guests’ expectations. Our full meeting and event offerings include: Executive Meeting Center - Offering 11 breakout rooms opening onto a single corridor, the EMC allows for smooth transitions from meeting to meeting. It's ideal for groups of 100 or less. International Collection - A unique trio of spaces, the lobby-level International Collection accommodates from 50 to 1400 guests and an array of event functions - all the way to the most complex and media-intensive. Beverly Hills Collection - With 7 meeting spaces and 2 ballrooms.Hilton

name: Boston Marriott Cambridge
description: Boston Marriott Cambridge exudes modern style and exceptional service and offers an unparalleled location in trendy Kendall Square. Tour the campuses of nearby MIT and Harvard Universities, experience a ballgame at historic Fenway Park, enjoy a stroll along the Charles River, be inspired on the Innovation Trail tour, or for the perfect family-friendly activity, visit the Museum of Science or MIT Museum. Our hotel in Kendall Square, Cambridge, MA, is steps away from the Red Line and provides easy access to downtown Boston, just two subway stops away. You can take in all the sights, shopping and more along Newbury Street and Back Bay. Plan future meetings or social events in nearly 13,000 square feet of versatile event space. At the end of your day, unwind in our modern guest rooms and suites and enjoy fantastic amenities like our 24-hour fitness center, complete with Peloton® bikes and the M Club Lounge.Marriott

name: Casa Del Mar
description: This Santa Monica oceanfront hotel features 2 on-site restaurants and has a hydrotherapy spa tub in each room. It offers an outdoor pool and hot tub. 3rd Street Promenade is 5 minutes’ walk away. Some rooms include views of the ocean. A 42-inch flat-screen cable satellite TV is featured in each air-conditioned room at Casa Del Mar. Each elegant room is decorated in soft colors and features floor-to-ceiling glass windows. All of the pet-friendly rooms include a coffee maker, a mini-bar and ironing facilities. Offering a menu of fresh seafood and a daily raw bar, Catch is located at Casa Del Mar. The restaurant is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner and features a weekend brunch with live music every Sunday afternoon. Small plates and nightly music are offered at The Terrazza, located in the hotel lobby. The restaurant provides guests with 180 degree views of the Pacific ocean and offers breakfast, lunch, and cocktails at night. Guests of Santa Monica Casa Del Mar can work out in the fitness room and private trainers are available. A business center with fax and photocopying services and a gift shop are located on site. Venice Beach is 15 minutes’ drive away from this hotel. Los Angeles International Airport is 9 miles away.

name: The Los Angeles Athletic Club
description: TLC Chinese Theater is 15 minutes’ drive from this Los Angeles hotel. Guests have free use of the athletic club with fitness classes and an indoor pool. Wi-Fi is available in all rooms, and several dining options are available on-site. Decorated in dark colors with bright accents, each room at The Los Angeles Athletic Club includes a flat-screen cable TV, turn-down service, and a refrigerator. On-site dining is available at The Athletic Club Los Angeles. Famous Players offers members and guests a relaxing, upscale bistro setting for breakfast and lunch. Invention Bar/Restaurant serves pre-prohibition cocktails using fresh ingredients and high quality spirits. The Invention dining area has a nightly special, a wine list and a seasonal menu. Invention is open Monday through Sunday. The 25-yard pool features 5 pool lanes and a small children’s pool is available. Basketball, squash and volleyball can be found in the athletic club. The club also offers personal training. The Los Angeles Convention Center is 5 minutes’ drive from this hotel. Staples Center is 1 mile away.

name: The Newbury Boston
description: This 5-star hotel provides elegant accommodation in Boston and is within walking distance of Arlington Railway Station. It also has views of Public Garden and Boston Commons. This cosy hotel provides vip rooms, meeting rooms and a library. Honeymoon suites are available for those looking for some added luxury. There are 286 rooms at The Newbury Boston, each offering all the necessities to ensure a comfortable stay. The Newbury Boston offers a variety of places to have a meal, including The Rooftop and The Street Bar. A wide selection of eating options can also be found in close proximity to the property. The hotel is conveniently situated for sightseeing in Boston with the Boston Public Library and Copley Square within a 10-minute walk. Guests can also visit Prudential Center, Back Bay and Boston Freedom Trail.Revato

name: Life House, Little Havana
description: Life House Little Havana - Miami is located in Miami and is close to Bayfront Park. It also offers an express check-in and check-out feature, free Wi-Fi and a 24-hour reception. This 4-star hotel provides a wake-up service, a concierge and a lift. Additional services include 24-hour security. The rooms at Life House Little Havana - Miami are air-conditioned and offer an iPod docking station and ironing facilities. They are also fitted with a hair dryer and a shower. Those staying at the hotel can dine on Caribbean and South American cuisine at the on-site bar, ideally situated for a meal and a drink. A selection of cafés and restaurants are also found in the area. Life House Little Havana - Miami is an ideal base to explore nearby Fisher Island and Ocean Drive, as well as everything the local area has to offer. Those staying at the property can also easily discover nearby attractions, such as Port of Miami and American Airlines Arena.Revato

name: Chamberlain West Hollywood
description: Located in West Hollywood (Norma Triangle), Chamberlain West Hollywood is within a 10-minute walk of Sunset Strip and Whiskey a Go Go. Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, express check-out, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Event facilities at this hotel consist of a conference center and a meeting room.Hotels.com

name: Le Parc at Melrose
address: 733 North West Knoll Drive, West Hollywood, CA 90069
description: Discover an urban oasis and ultimate relaxation at this luxury boutique hotel, located in the heart of West Hollywood city center. Enjoy elegant amenities and state-of-the-art facilities, seconds from the action of the city. Le Parc at Melrose features numerous modern amenities and facilities. Guests can experience the beautiful city from the hotel's roof, equipped with tennis courts, a swimming pool and a sun deck. Accessible rooms are also available upon request. Only steps from Le Parc's front doors are many of the area's most famous attractions. Enjoy luxury shopping on Rodeo Drive, dine at legendary restaurants, or discover the vibrant nightlife of Santa Monica Boulevard.

name: SLS Brickell
description: At the center of it all SLS Brickell takes its standards of style, luxury and service to transform Downtown Miami skyline. A feast for the senses. A creative cocktail of sophistication and playfulness. A Hotel with elements of creativity and community featuring 124 rooms, world class décor by Philippe Starck, unforgettable dining by two award winning chefs, an incredible pool deck, exclusive access to SLS Collection and global concierge, SLS Brickell is an irresistible retreat in the city's center.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Amarano Burbank - Hollywood
description: A 15-minute walk from the Warner Brothers Studio, this contemporary Burbank hotel offers on-site dining and an outdoor swimming pool. All rooms include Wi-Fi and bottled water. The Hotel Amarano Burbank-Hollywood features comfortably furnished rooms with luxury linens, a bathrobe. A flat-screen TV with complimentary satellite and an iPod docking station are included. A continental breakfast is served every morning. The Greek Theater is 15 minutes’ drive away.

name: Kimpton Marlowe Hotel
address: 25 Edwin H. Land Boulevard, Cambridge, MA 02141
description: An alluring courtyard with an interactive celestial sculpture welcomes guests to our inspiring Cambridge getaway on the Charles River. While Kimpton Marlowe Hotel emphasizes luxury and lavish style, it also links the intellectual and innovative spirit of Boston and Cambridge. Guests attend to the mind, body and soul in renovated guestrooms and suites that feature calming colors, locally-inspired artwork, custom furnishings and (often) sensational views; thoughtful amenities place a focus on staying fit, pampered and well-fed—thanks to Bambara Kitchen + Bar—while in our care.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Beverly Wilshire, A Four Seasons Hotel
description: Beverly Wilshire, a 4 Seasons Hotel is located across the street from Rodeo Drive. The hotel features a Mediterranean-style pool and hot tub with private cabanas. The property is in a popular location to shop at Rodeo Drive, and is also in close proximity to areas such as Hollywood, Santa Monica, and Venice Beach. Rooms offer a flat-screen cable TV. Free WiFi for 1 device is available in all rooms at the hotel. A DVD player and an iPod docking station are offered and a mini-bar is included. Most rooms boast views of Rodeo Drive or the Hollywood Hills. Guests can relax in The Spa and enjoy massages, facials, and organic treatments using a wide range of products. A fitness center with state-of-the-art gym equipment is on site. Guests can enjoy complimentary fresh fruit, juice, bottled water, and pitchered water with natural fruit at the hotel. Meeting centers are also available. The pool offers cabanas at a surcharge and lunch dining is available at the poolside bar & cafe. Various dining options are available at the Beverly Wilshire. the CUT Lounge, a michelin star-rated steakhouse with a menu created by Wolfgang Puck, features seafood and steakhouse staples with cocktails and rare wines and spirits from around the world in a Mediterranean setting. THE Blvd, a mediterranean restaurant that offers outdoor seating overlooking Rodeo Drive. The Pool Bar and Café offers casual poolside dining, serving sandwiches, Paninis, salads, and desserts. In-room dining is also offered at the property. Los Angeles International Airport is 12 mi from the property. The Los Angeles County Museum of Art is 15 minutes’ drive from this hotel, while the Sunset Strip is 3 mi away. The Santa Monica Pier is 30 minutes’ drive away.

name: Sunset Marquis
address: 1200 Alta Loma Road, West Hollywood, CA 90069
description: The Sunset Marquis Hotel Los Angeles is located in the heart of West Hollywood. Hidden away in a tree lined cul-de-sac, it is just steps from the famed sidewalks of the Sunset Strip in West Hollywood. The property features 2 outdoor pools and an on-site restaurant. Villas at the property include unique amenities like private elevators, kitchens,dining rooms, televisions, and living rooms. Suites include similar amenities with toiletries and Bluetooth enabled mobile speakers. There is an on-site bar available at the hotel. There is also a fitness center and spa available on-site. Guests can enjoy the gardens and 24-hour front desk. The property also is home to successful recording studios and an art gallery. The Sunset Strip is less than 0.6 mi from the property, while the Farmer's Market Los Angeles is 1.7 mi away. Dolby Theater and the Hollywood Walk of Fame are 2.3 mi away. Los Angeles International Airport is 12 mi from the property.

name: Shutters on the Beach
description: Located directly on the beach, this Santa Monica, California resort features 2 oceanfront restaurants, an outdoor swimming pool and a spa. Providing luxury white linens, every room offers plush bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries at Shutters On The Beach. Styled in hardwood floors with a refined Tibetan rug, each room provides an iPod docking station and a 42-inch flat-screen TV. An in-room library is offered. Select rooms offer a balcony and select rooms offer spacious spa bathtubs. Boasting a panoramic ocean view and an oversize elegant white fireplace, One Pico offers seasonal cuisine on intimate tables with blue plush chairs. The beachfront café, Coast offers a casual atmosphere with a bar and lite bites. Featuring a heated terrace with an ocean view, the Living Room features afternoon tea, cocktails and a full menu of freshly prepared morsels. A poolside outdoor hot tub is offered. Valet parking is provided. A gift shop is also available at Sutter On the Beach Santa Monica. Santa Monica Pier is just 5 minutes’ walk down the beach. Los Angeles International Airport is 9 miles away from Shutters On The Beach.

name: W Boston
description: Immerse in the music, fashion and art of the downtown district. W Boston is a contemporary hotel in downtown Boston, Massachusetts, of style and sophistication. Comfort awaits in boutique, renovated hotel rooms showcasing signature amenities, custom décor and stunning views of our iconic Theatre District. Your enhanced accommodations include slate-finished bathrooms, innovative entertainment technology and custom murals. Savor New England staples and international dishes at the Gallery Restaurant and W Lounge. We also offer vibrant event spaces for any gathering in this historic destination. When you're ready to tackle the city, attend a Broadway show, shop locally or explore celebrated attractions, including Fenway Park, New England Aquarium and Chinatown. Our luxury downtown Boston, MA hotel is refinement redefined.Marriott

name: Renaissance Boston Waterfront Hotel
description: Renaissance Boston Waterfront Hotel invites guests to relax amidst well-appointed accommodations, modern hotel amenities and a scenic waterfront location on Congress St. Visit Capiz Lounge, our bar and lounge in the Seaport District, for craft cocktails and light bites. Recharge with a swim in our indoor pool or work out in our hotel's well-equipped fitness center. After an eventful day exploring Boston, relax in your hotel room or suite, which features a marble bathroom, plush pillowtop mattress and sweeping views of the Boston waterfront. Enjoy easy access to Logan Airport and the Boston Convention and Exhibition Center from our Seaport District hotel and access many top attractions in Boston, MA, via water taxi transport. We also offer more than 20,000 square feet of meeting and event space in Boston, making our boutique hotel the perfect destination for conferences, weddings and social events. Chart your own course at Renaissance Boston Waterfront Hotel.Marriott

name: Plaza la Reina
description: Plaza La Reina is located in Westwood Village, close to Beverly Hills and Santa Monica. This hotel offers guest rooms with free WiFi, international and domestic calls and valet parking. The Getty Cente is 3.1 mi away. Each room at the hotel features a fully equipped kitchen, a washer and tumble dryer, a personal safe and a Keurig® coffee machine. Plaza La Reina features upscale amenities such as concierge service, a rooftop lounge, alfresco dining and daily newspapers. A business center is also available. Universal Studios is 11 mi away from Plaza La Reina. Los Angeles International Airport (LAX) is 9.9 mi away.

name: Ayres Hotel Manhattan Beach
description: Welcome to the Ayres Hotel Manhattan Beach/LAX-a gem of the Ayres Hotel Collection. No detail has been overlooked in this first-class, full-service hotel, conveniently located near major corporation, airports and shopping destination. Join Ayres Rewards Today!: Earn free nights fast with Ayres Rewards. You can also choose from gift cards to over 100+ different retailers. With Ayres Hotels, your travel will be truly elevated!iHotelier/iStay

name: The Liberty, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Boston
description: The Liberty, a Luxury Collection Hotel, in Boston, blends history, sophistication and hometown warmth and is the ideal place for a quintessentially Boston experience. Located at the foot of Beacon Hill, our Boston Jail hotel is steps away from outdoor fun on the Esplanade and posh shopping along Charles Street. A national historic landmark and architectural gem built in 1851, this refined 298-room hotel originated as the storied Charles Street Jail. Today, our prominent location showcases sweeping views of the Boston city skyline and the Charles River, along with five distinct food and beverage venues and 14,000 square feet of meeting space. Reserve your stay at The Liberty Hotel and delight in our rich history, unique architecture and a team of passionate New England natives, ready to create an unrivaled guest experience in Boston, MA.Marriott

name: Pendry West Hollywood
description: Located in Los Angeles, 2.5 miles from Dolby Theater, Pendry West Hollywood has accommodations with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness center and a shared lounge. This 5-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The property provides an ATM, a concierge service and luggage storage for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Pendry West Hollywood rooms come with bed linen and towels. An à la carte, American or vegetarian breakfast is served at the property. At the accommodation you'll find a restaurant serving American, Mediterranean and Asian cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Pendry West Hollywood has a sun terrace. Petersen Automotive Museum is 3.1 miles from the hotel, while Capitol Records Building is 3.1 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Hollywood Burbank Airport, 9.3 miles from Pendry West Hollywood.

name: Palihouse West Hollywood
description: This pet-friendly Los Angeles hotel is 5 minutes' walk to the Beverly Center shopping area. The boutique hotel offers an outdoor saltwater pool, a Pool Lounge, Lobby Lounge, and Mezzanine Sushi. Each room at Palihouse West Hollywood includes custom designed bespoke furniture, Bellino Fine Linens, Diptyque bath amenities, plush robes, an oversize rain shower, and complimentary Wi-Fi Guests can enjoy the Fitness room featuring Peloton bikes at Palihouse West Hollywood. Concierge services are also available 24 hours. The Farmer's Market is a 13-minute walk of Palihouse West Hollywood in Los Angeles. The Grove is 1 mile away.

name: L'Ermitage Beverly Hills
description: Established in 1975 on a palm-lined residential boulevard, L’Ermitage is a discreet, luxurious getaway located a stone’s throw from the beating heart of Beverly Hills. As the first all-suite hotel in the nation, L’Ermitage is committed to offering travelers 5-star service, excellence in hospitality, and spacious accommodations. Our 116 suites preserve the residential elegance of the hotel’s original design while providing guests with a range of spacious layouts and modern appointments. Inside, guests will find luxurious walk-through dressing rooms with ample wardrobe space, full-length triptych mirrors with warm adjustable lighting, and generous vanities that evoke a sense of old Hollywood glamor. We offer flexible check-in and check-out, and ask our guests to provide estimated arrival time so we can accomodate their arrival time request. L'Ermitage has a complimentary car service available to our guests daily in our BMW 5-Series in a 2 mile radius. The property offers charging stations for eco-friendly cars as well as two TESLA charging stations. Guests at the L'Ermitage Beverly Hills can use the modern fitness center or have a drink at the trendy Lounge. Brunch and dinner are served at the hotel's Avec Nous restaurant. The Los Angeles County Museum of Art and the University of California are within a short drive of L'Ermitage Beverly Hills. The Los Angeles Convention Center is also nearby.

name: Fairmont Century Plaza
address: 2025 Avenue Of The Stars, Los Angeles, CA 90067
description: Los Angeles' famed Century Plaza hotel has returned to center stage following a $2.5B renovation. The property has been completely reimagined with 400 expansive guest rooms featuring private terraces, 63 luxury residences, the 14,000 square-foot Fairmont Spa Century Plaza, Lumière - a French-inspired Brasserie, and 24,000 square-feet of private event space. Born on the former site of a 20th Century Studios backlot in 1966, the Century Plaza has always been at the center of where business meets Hollywood.accorhotels.com

name: Santa Monica Proper Hotel
description: Santa Monica Proper introduces a more laid back kind of luxury to Santa Monica. Here, within walking distance to the beach, each of the 267 guestrooms and spaces successfully harnesses the city’s abundant ocean breezes and natural light, while the interior design pays homage to the organic tones and textures of the local coastline. Santa Monica Proper tempts guests with the only rooftop pool deck on the Westside, a singular vantage point for sunsets over the Pacific that includes a Balearic restaurant, bar, and cabanas, while the landmark Onda restaurant, marks a synergistic collaboration between James Beard award-winning chefs Jessica Koslow and Gabriela Camara. Taking Eastern-inspired wellness as a guide, the hotel’s Surya Spa (opening in winter), presided over by internationally renowned Ayurvedic guru Martha Soffer, offers tailored holistic health programs. Anything less just wouldn't be Proper.Marriott

name: Mr. C Miami - Coconut Grove
description: Located in Miami, a few steps from Cocowalk Shopping Center, Mr. C Miami - Coconut Grove has accommodations with free bikes, private parking, a fitness center and a garden. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi. The property provides evening entertainment and a concierge service. At the hotel, rooms contain a desk. Featuring a shared bathroom with a bath and free toiletries, certain accommodations at Mr. C Miami - Coconut Grove also feature a sea view. The rooms have a safety deposit box. An American breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. Mr. C Miami - Coconut Grove has a terrace. Vizcaya Museum is 2.8 miles from the hotel, while University of Miami is 3.2 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Miami International Airport, 6.2 miles from Mr. C Miami - Coconut Grove.

name: Hotel 850 Svb West Hollywood At Beverly Hills
address: 850 North San Vicente Boulevard, West Hollywood, CA 90069
description: Located in Los Angeles, 2.4 miles from Petersen Automotive Museum, Hotel 850 SVB West Hollywood at Beverly Hills has accommodations with free bikes, private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. This 4-star hotel offers a shared kitchen, room service and free WiFi. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar. At the hotel, the rooms are equipped with a desk. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, all rooms at Hotel 850 SVB West Hollywood at Beverly Hills have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms also feature a balcony. At the accommodation the rooms have bed linen and towels. Guests at Hotel 850 SVB West Hollywood at Beverly Hills can enjoy a continental breakfast. Staff at the hotel are available to give advice at the 24-hour front desk. Los Angeles County Museum Of Art (LACMA) is 2.4 miles from Hotel 850 SVB West Hollywood at Beverly Hills, while Dolby Theater is 3.9 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Hollywood Burbank Airport, 11 miles from the accommodation.

name: The Row Hotel at Assembly Row, Autograph Collection
description: Where bold character and uncommon details meet, The Row Hotel at Assembly Row, Autograph Collection is an original boutique hotel in Somerville, MA designed for the modern traveler. Combining historic charm with a modern twist, this once Ford Motor Assembly Plant offers travelers an escape from the predictable in vibrant Assembly Row – a center of shopping, dining and entertainment near Boston. At our hotel near the Boston Casino, unique perspectives and warm hospitality combine with heartfelt designs to create curated experiences, from our 24-hour fitness center and heated indoor pool, to rooms and suites that offer a sense of place, with personal touches like pillow top mattresses, ergonomic workspaces and comfy bath robes. We have over 4,000 square-feet of distinguished event venues and access to The T, with transit service to downtown Boston, TD Garden, Fenway Park, and the Boston Convention & Exhibition Center. From the warm welcome to tailored comforts, discover uncommon at our Assembly Row hotel!Marriott

name: The Standard Spa Miami Beach
description: Featuring a full-service spa, this adult-only Miami Beach hotel also features rooms with a view of the lush gardens, Biscayne Bay, and outdoor infinity pool. Guests will be 12 minutes' walk to Lincoln Road Mall and 5 minutes' drive to South Beach. The spa amenities, which are complimentary to hotel guests, include a Turkish Hamam with heated marble, hemlock sauna, eucalyptus steam room, ice room, hot tub, cold plunge and gym are also on site. Massages, facials, manicures, pedicures, and full-body scrubs are offered as well at the Spa of The Standard Miami Beach, located in South Florida. The restaurant, Lido Bayside Grill, uses locally sourced ingredients and seasonal produce, with a global-inspired menu including expertly-grilled dishes, fried options, and chilled dishes. There is also an indoor healthy cafe restaurant and speakeasy-style bar and lounge. In addition to a bicycle hire and a private boat dock, guests can enjoy paddle boarding and kayaks. Miami International Airport is 20 minutes’ drive away.

name: The Charles Hotel
description: Set in the heart of Harvard Square, this luxurious Cambridge hotel combines classic New England style with award-winning dining, elegant guestrooms and 24-hour personalized concierge services. Each of the rooms at The Charles Hotel in Harvard Square offers flat-screen TVs and DVD players. Guests can also enjoy free access to a nearby state-of-the-art fitness center as well as the on-site library and wireless internet access. While staying at the Charles, guests can take advantage of gourmet on-site dining options, such as the vibrant jazz club, the Regattabar. Classic New England cuisine is available at Henrietta's Table and rustic Italian dishes are featured at Benedetto. Popular area attractions, including the famed Harvard University are only moments from the Charles in Harvard Square. A number of charming cafes, shops and restaurants are also easily accessible. Boston city center is a short drive away with on-site car hire services.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Chatsworth
address: 9777 Topanga Canyon Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA 91311
description: Situated near the intersection of SR-27 and the Ronald Reagan Freeway, Radisson Hotel Chatsworth provides easy access to the best of SoCal. In a peaceful location bordering Simi Valley, our hotel places you near local businesses and renowned institutions like The Ronald Reagan Presidential Library. We are about a half hour from the Hollywood Walk of Fame and roughly 35 miles from LAX. If you are here for work, stay productive with free WiFi and our business center. Caprese, our restaurant and lounge, is the perfect place to meet clients or colleagues. We also offer room service, free parking, valet laundry service, an outdoor pool, and a fitness center. Our guest rooms have a mini fridge, a flat-screen TV, and a desk. Plus, you can earn rewards, including free nights and gift cards, with our Choice Privileges Rewards program.Choice Hotels

name: Hotel Aka Brickell
description: The following services and amenities are available, but with reduced service: Fitness Center, Breakfast, On-site Restaurant(s), Pool, Room Service, Valet Parking.The following services and amenities are currently not available: Business Center, Concierge, Spa.Decidedly modern, boldly conceived, and beautifully designed, this luxury hotel creates a unique sensory experience for its guests. The 203 guest rooms and 103 residence suites were stylishly created with a sophisticated traveler in mind, combining some of the finest services with high-tech facilities. Located in a concave building of glittering glass and steel, AKA Hotel Brickell features a minimalist and contemporary design, in the of heart Miami's business district. Our Brickell Avenue address provides guests with easy access to many area attractions, including South Beach, Coconut Grove and Key Biscayne, and is just 15 minutes from Miami International Airport. Overlooking the sparkling Biscayne Bay and within walking distance to a myriad of shopping and dining destinations, you couldn't be better placed. As perfectly formed as the Miami skyline, this sleek downtown luxury hotel offers an array of room options, including guest rooms, studios, and one and two bedroom residence suites. Capturing a sense of understated elegance, and accessorized with complementary elements of glass, wood, leather and metal, AKA Hotel Brickell welcomes you to experience the city's innate sense of style and flair. Experience a symphony of International flavors and style at Level 25 - Miami's only restaurant and lounge, 25 stories in the sky. Discover how world-class vintages of The Wine Attic pair perfectly with Atrio's progressive, global fare. After, whet your palate with a creative cocktail at The Bar, while sharing savory Spanish pintxos, perfectly executed with an innovative twist. Elevate your nose for wine with a fine selection of wines by the glass and personalized attention of our on-staff sommelier.FarePortal

name: Boston Marriott Long Wharf
description: Sailboats glide across the water as the city skyline gleams in the background. This is Boston’s iconic waterfront – and Boston Marriott Long Wharf is where the harbor comes to life. Only a short water taxi ride from Logan Airport, our artfully designed hotel near downtown Waterfront welcomes you with the irresistible energy of Boston Harbor. Steps from the New England Aquarium and historic Faneuil Hall, our desirable location is the place where modern revolutionaries meet and explore all that Boston has to offer. Walk in the footsteps of history along the Freedom Trail – or write your own story from the elegant wedding and event venues overlooking Boston Harbor. Stylish rooms and suites offer the ultimate urban retreat with spa bathrooms and striking water or city views. Enjoy our heated indoor pool and 24-hour fitness center, or dine beside the shimmering harborside. The multi-level M Club is a private space for eligible Marriott Bonvoy® members to work, connect, or unwind in an exclusive lounge.Marriott

name: Hotel Colonnade Coral Gables, Autograph Collection
description: Surround yourself with world class shopping, decadent dining and electrifying entertainment venues at Hotel Colonnade Coral Gables, Autograph Collection. Our luxury hotel flaunts an ideal location along Miracle Mile near the area's most popular destinations including University of Miami, Watsco Center, Marlins Park as well as Little Havana. Boasting vaulted ceilings, a grand staircase and sparkling chandeliers, our spectacular hotel lobby sets the scene for our stylishly designed accommodations. Unpack in spacious rooms and suites with wood floors, sectional sofas, modern decor and deluxe amenities before relaxing on a canopy bed with plush, pillow-top mattresses and luxurious linens. In your free time, maintain your wellness routine at our hotel's fitness center, play a round of billiards in our game room or soak up the sunshine next to our gorgeous rooftop pool. From our boutique accommodations to intuitive amenities, Hotel Colonnade Coral Gables, Autograph Collection will entice your sense of enjoyment.Marriott

name: The Setai, Miami Beach
description: Located directly on the beach in Miami’s famous Art Deco district, this resort offers yoga and tai-chi classes. Suites are furnished in Asian-style décor. Free WiFi and an iPod docking station are provided in every spacious suite at The Setai, Miami Beach. Rooms are equipped with espresso and coffee facilities along with a mini-bar. Miami Beach Setai features 3 infinity swimming pools and a business center. The on-site spa offers a number of massages and treatments, including a 60-minute Nepalese Body Polish. Concierges are available to provide recommendations. Guests can dine at 4 on-site restaurants including The Setai Grill, an American steakhouse serving Asian-inspired dishes. The Bar & Courtyard offers nightly drinks and snacks. Bayshore Golf Course is 1 mi from the resort. The Setai, Miami Beach is 1 mi from Lummus Park and 1050 feet from Bass Museum of Art.

name: westdrift Manhattan Beach, Autograph Collection
description: Live the laid-back Southern California South Bay lifestyle at westdrift Manhattan Beach, Autograph Collection. Located close to beaches, businesses and LAX, our 4-star family-friendly Manhattan Beach luxury hotel blends East Coast bold with West Coast cool. Throughout the hotel, you'll find spaces to gather, take a break or refuel for the day. Relax in our elegant, pet-friendly rooms and suites designed with coastal-infused luxury and city or golf course views. Savor delicious coastal cuisine and creative cocktails at our indoor-outdoor restaurant. Tee up on our nine-hole golf course, just right for a short game or combining work with play, go for a swim in our outdoor pool or work out in our CrossFit-inspired fitness center. Our 35,000 square feet of multifaceted indoor/outdoor event space set the stage for meetings, weddings and social events with outstanding services and custom catering. Whether traveling to our Manhattan Beach, CA hotel for work or play, we invite you to enjoy our warm hospitality.Marriott

name: Palihotel Hollywood
description: No description found

name: Hilton Bentley Miami/South Beach
description: Daily Resort Charge will be added to the room rate and includes: Guest internet access: beach services (2 chairs, 2 bottles of water, 1 umbrella, towels): 15% discount on Spa & Salon services: 2 in-room bottles of water: small sunblock: turndown services on request: Pressreader.Experience the beautiful Hilton Bentley Miami/South Beach hotel at world-famous 101 Ocean Drive of South Beach, Miami. Discover a luxurious beachfront paradise in an intimate, elegant world-class setting. The Hilton Bentley hotel offers a stellar walk-to-anything location in South Beach's 'Sofi', a refined and sophisticated enclave of Miami Beach. Guests are footsteps to Miami Beach's playground of the finest restaurants and nightlife, one mile away from Lincoln Road and the Miami Beach Convention Center, three miles away from the Port of Miami, and only seven miles from Miami International Airport. Relax in style in the amenity-rich suites of Hilton Bentley. Offering modern elegance, each of our studio, one-bedroom, two-bedroom and penthouse suites have been designed to exquisite detail. Enjoy contemporary European furnishings, Italian marble floors,50-inch LCD TVs, and stainless steel gourmet kitchens and kitchenettes. Experience the majestic views of the Atlantic Ocean and Miami Beach.Hilton

name: Four Seasons Hotel Miami
description: Located above trendy Brickell Avenue, it's here where you will find the best of both big city adventure and tropical paradise, where a two-acre sun-kissed sanctuary overlooks the city's fashionable art, dining, and entertainment scenes all minutes from its doorstep A flat-screen cable TV, marble private bathroom, and a city or bay view are featured in all rooms. Four Seasons Hotel Miami also provides a seating area and desk with ergonomic chair. When guests are not in of the 2 outdoor pools, they can enroll in fitness classes like cycling or yoga. Access to free Wi-Fi, a hot tub, and sauna are provided to all Four Seasons Hotel guests. Edge, Steak & Bar features contemporary American cuisine from locally sourced seafood and vegetables to steaks in a dining room, bar, and outdoor terrace. Bahía offers poolside dining and beverages. Guests will find a variety of boutiques and eateries within 2 miles of the hotel at Bayside Marketplace. American Airlines Arena is 2 miles away.

name: Silver Lake Pool & Inn
address: 4141 Santa Monica Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA 90026
description: Located in Los Angeles, 3.2 miles from Capitol Records Building, Silver Lake Pool & Inn has accommodations with free bikes, private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a garden. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can have a drink at the bar. At the hotel rooms contain a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. An American breakfast is available each morning at Silver Lake Pool & Inn. At the accommodation you'll find a restaurant serving Italian cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Silver Lake Pool & Inn has a terrace. Griffith Observatory is 3.5 miles from the hotel, while Dodger Stadium is 3.6 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Hollywood Burbank Airport, 11 miles from Silver Lake Pool & Inn.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Torrance - South Bay
description: The Doubletree Hotel Torrance / South Bay in the heart of the Torrance financial and shopping district offers luxurious southern California accommodations in a suburban Los Angeles setting only minutes from beautiful Pacific Ocean beaches. Located just 15 minutes south of Los Angeles International Airport (LAX), our first-class hotel is directly across the street from the famous Del Amo Fashion Center, and offers easy access to the 110 and 405 Freeways. Our hotel guests enjoy complimentary onsite parking, and scheduled shuttle service to Redondo Beach Pier is available daily. Warmly and elegantly appointed, our spacious guestrooms, suites, and executive accommodations pamper with marble baths, generous amenities, and our fabulously comfortable Sweet Dreams beds. Modern must-haves like work desks with data ports, flat screen TVs, and high-speed internet access keep you connected while on the road. Our beautiful courtyard rooms overlook a lushly landscaped heated pool and whirlpool area, where you can take a refreshing dip at the end of a busy day or lounge in the afternoon sun after an invigorating work out in our state-of-the-art Fitness Center. For recreational activities of all sort, stop by our concierge desk to arrange for sight-seeing tours or a morning round of golf. The beach, tennis, Universal Studios, Disneyland, Beverly Hills, Home Depot Sports Center, Trump National Golf Course, and Downtown Los Angeles are all just a short drive away. If dining is your sport, the Doubletree is your hotel of choice. We're situated overlooking Torrance's ''restaurant row'', which offers an array of choices from Japanese to Mexican, seafood to steak. Or, dine in at our classically elegant yet comfortable hotel restaurant, Andre's, serving California cuisine and all your favorites, including healthy menu choices, for breakfast, lunch and dinner daily. Don't miss our award-winning Sunday Brunch. On the go? Stop by our Café for a cup of Starbucks, fresh baked goods, salads and light fare. Before dinner or after, relax with friends or colleagues by the fireplace at the inviting Vintage Lounge, serving fine wines by the glass, tasty appetizers, and your favorite spirits. Southern California business travel is a pleasure at the Doubletree in Torrance. You'll appreciate our Executive Business Center, well-equipped with computers, HSIA, and everything you need to remain productive. We're located in close proximity to dozens of businesses and corporate offices, like Alcoa Fastening, American Honda, Dow Chemical, Exxon Mobil, Hughes Aircraft, Toyota and others. Our hotel has over 16,000 square feet of beautifully decorated, modern, flexible meeting space - including an Executive Boardroom and two ballrooms, so we can accommodate your next successful business conference or training seminar with ease. And, our professional banquet staff will gladly create a memorable experience for your special gala reception or social event held in our exquisite Penthouse Ballroom overlooking spectacular views of the South Bay. Whether for business, shopping junket, family vacation, or romantic getaway - on your next visit to Torrance and the Los Angeles area our friendly, helpful hotel staff looks forward to welcoming you to southern California with our signature, warm chocolate chip cookie at check-in.Hilton

name: Four Seasons Hotel Los Angeles at Beverly Hills
address: 300 South Doheny Drive, Los Angeles, CA 90048
description: Located in the center of Los Angeles this luxurious, full-service hotel provides rooms with French doors opening to private balconies. This 5-star hotel features a full-service spa and outdoor pool. These air conditioned rooms at the Four Seasons Los Angeles at Beverly Hills offer views of the gardens, Hollywood Hills, Los Angeles or Beverly Hills. They are furnished with a living area and cable TV, a DVD player and iPod docking station. On-site dining provides guests with indoor or outdoor seating options and specializes in Italian cuisine. Cocktails are available at Windows Lounge located in the Four Seasons Los Angeles. Los Angeles Four Seasons at Beverly Hills features a library and gym. Guests can relax in the sauna or use the business center. Rodeo Drive and Melrose Avenue are within walking distance from the Four Seasons at Beverly Hills. Downtown Los Angeles is 11 mi away.

name: Boston Harbor Hotel
description: Boston Harbor Hotel is conveniently located in the popular Boston City Center area. The property offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Boston Harbor Hotel. Flat screen television, carpeting, linens, mirror, towels can be found in selected guestrooms. To enhance guests' stay, the property offers recreational facilities such as fitness center, sauna, indoor pool, spa, massage. No matter what your reasons are for visiting Boston (MA), Boston Harbor Hotel will make you feel instantly at home.Agoda

name: Loews Coral Gables Hotel
description: Located in Miami, 2 miles from Cocowalk Shopping Center, Loews Coral Gables Hotel has accommodations with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness center and a shared lounge. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi. The property provides an ATM, a concierge service and luggage storage for guests. Rooms have a safety deposit box, while certain rooms come with a balcony. The rooms at the hotel have air conditioning and a desk. Guests at Loews Coral Gables Hotel can enjoy an American breakfast. Guests can use the business center or relax in the bar. University of Miami is 3 miles from the accommodation, while Vizcaya Museum is 4.1 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Miami International Airport, 3.7 miles from Loews Coral Gables Hotel.

name: The Ritz-Carlton Key Biscayne Miami
address: 455 Grand Bay Drive, Key Biscayne, FL 33149
description: Escape to a luxury Miami Beach resort that exudes the classic charm of South Florida. Located on an exclusive five-mile-long barrier island, The Ritz-Carlton Key Biscayne, Miami is just minutes from dynamic downtown, yet provides an atmosphere of sequestered serenity. With elegant architecture inspired by West Indies Colonial design, The Ritz-Carlton Key Biscayne, Miami is one of the finest beach hotels Miami, Florida has to offer.Marriott

name: AC Hotel by Marriott Los Downtown Los Angeles
address: 1260 South Figueroa Street, Los Angeles, CA 90015
description: AC Hotel Downtown Los Angeles places guests in the heart of downtown Los Angeles near LA Live and the LA Convention Center. Our hotel blends the AC brand’s timeless Spanish heritage with the artistic soul of Los Angeles, CA. Revel in artful designs from Yabu Pushelberg, who have created an elegant atelier for thinkers and doers. Find ample space and floor-to-ceiling windows in our 347 ethereal hotel rooms, which each provide a serene place to live, work, create and recharge. Visit a warm, light-filled bar and lounge or head on up to our hotel's 34th-floor rooftop garden with sweeping views of Los Angeles. Dial up the fun factor in DTLA, with 11 additional restaurants, bars and clubs, plus three outdoor terraces. It's all found just an elevator ride away at AC Hotel Downtown Los Angeles.Marriott

name: W Los Angeles - West Beverly Hills
description: W Los Angeles – West Beverly Hills welcomes hotel guests to its urban retreat with personalized service, high-energy interiors and luxury amenities. Stay in the heart of Westwood, LA, steps from UCLA and the Medical Center and minutes from designer boutiques on Rodeo Drive, Santa Monica beaches and West LA museums.
